channel.title: Dear moparscape mods
channel.description:
Hiya there and welcome to my thread! I just want to say a few things about the Moderators, and Admins...
Forum mods... ...Sometimes people join Moparscape just because they want FORUMS! FORUMS! FORUMS! Forum mods are truly amazing. What they have done is just...Fantastic.
They made the Forums an extremly safe place for Kids AND Adults. They help others with problems they have and they work hard at their job. Hand picked, honest, kind, loving people. Thank you Forum mods. Thank you. Your Awesome!
Moparscape Moderators... ...The Moparscape Community is nothing without Moparscape mods. You wouldn't belive what they can do. Heres a story!
So im at the questions section and im checking out whats happening in the moparscape world and my friend asks me to come to his house. I go in his house and I see people saying.."Need gf!". So I go up to my friend and asked him what kind of party this is. He said it was a dating party. I HATE DATING PARTYS!It's against the rules!....
So I'm trying to tell him it's against the rules and then suddenly...Two Moparscape Moderators step right in and have a word with my friend. It was AWESOME! Thanks Moparscape mods! You rock!
Admins... ...Admins created this amazing, addicting, eductaional, beneficial game. They are like angels from Moparscape Heaven. It hurts me to see that there is more rants then compliments but...I don't belive in rants. The admins made this game. They shouldn't be getting rants from players! They worked hard at this! They didnt make it and then sit on the couch and watch T.V.! They stayed on it and they did not back down on their goal. Now they were right!
It was succesful! Now theres like a billion players playing!:P. They should get LOTS and LOTS of credit. They reward honest and kind people by giving them the role of a Player Moderator or Forum Moderator. They are honest, kind, loving, hard-working people. They should get compliments only! Thank's staff. Thanks a million times a million.
Thanks for reading! *hands out cookies*:D

item.title: Dear moparscape mods
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:25, topic:224554”]So I’ll put this out there.

You people say the staff fails, well tbh your the reason it fails.
For example, if someone posts something in the wrong section, usually the first poster says it’s the wrong section, and than for some reason you idiots flock in and post a picture of relating to ‘fail’
Maybe if you didn’t do so much fucking idiotic stuff the site might be a bit better, I mean the mods all ready have enough work to do, you guys could help a little.

I would suggest anyone who even says a reference to fail should be banned for a week. Maybe indefinite.

@ the mods
When there are 20 pages of reports(as Tico said on irc) you guys need to help do them. I did 17 pages of them and that took forever, no one can do them all. Maybe you guys should get ban powers now, I mean the ban system is fixed and it would help a lot.

kthx[/quote]
/agree
As i said, the moderators do a good job, and skiller your tellingme if i wanked moparisthebest balls i would get a moderator… I think not so got the fuck off. Another thing i aint sucking up to become moderator an i don’t this casey is ither (Although i would like to be one … thats right me and casey moderator would be cool). The only reson why you moparscapians don’t become moderators is because you make idiotic posts like “OMG 100 error” or just spam/flame members when they post a server that ain’t in your like range.

^^Sucked up a little but i had to say it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

So I’ll put this out there.

You people say the staff fails, well tbh your the reason it fails.
For example, if someone posts something in the wrong section, usually the first poster says it’s the wrong section, and than for some reason you idiots flock in and post a picture of relating to ‘fail’
Maybe if you didn’t do so much fucking idiotic stuff the site might be a bit better, I mean the mods all ready have enough work to do, you guys could help a little.

I would suggest anyone who even says a reference to fail should be banned for a week. Maybe indefinite.

@ the mods
When there are 20 pages of reports(as Tico said on irc) you guys need to help do them. I did 17 pages of them and that took forever, no one can do them all. Maybe you guys should get ban powers now, I mean the ban system is fixed and it would help a lot.

kthx

item.title: Dear moparscape mods
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

casey.:

we are thanking the mods guys not dissing them!11

Thanking the mods for what, as you can see; ‘sammm’ managed to post 5 swear words 2 hours ago. And you’re giving mods credit for keeping it safe from kids. I can only imagine how many minors have read that post and influenced themselves from it.

2 Years on this forum, and what it has bought me is vast knowledge, however; I do not beleive the mods deserve this much credit for what they have done, I’m sorry.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 11:22:59[/size][hr][quote=“templer, post:11, topic:224554”]I only read some of it because I couldn’t be assed reading the rest, Moparscape fails itself, let alone it’s Moderators.[/quote]

I think this is an understatement. Yes I can strongly agree there are lots of ‘noobs’ on this forum, but also matched are there people with great knowledge and understanding as any other RuneScape private server development forums.

Read full topic
